actions.name: CreateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create an application configuration to migrate on-premise application onto AWS

actions.name: CreateReplicationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create a job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS

actions.name: DeleteApp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing application configuration

actions.name: DeleteAppLaunchConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete launch configuration for an existing application

actions.name: DeleteAppReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete replication configuration for an existing application

actions.name: DeleteAppValidationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete validation configuration for an existing application

actions.name: DeleteReplicationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS

actions.name: DeleteServerCatalog
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the complete list of on-premise servers gathered into AWS

actions.name: DisassociateConnector
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a connector that has been associated

actions.name: GenerateChangeSet
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a changeSet for the CloudFormation stack of an application

actions.name: GenerateTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a CloudFormation template for an existing application

actions.name: GetApp
actions.description: Grants permission to get the configuration and statuses for an existing application

actions.name: GetAppLaunchConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get launch configuration for an existing application

actions.name: GetAppReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get replication configuration for an existing application

actions.name: GetAppValidationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get validation configuration for an existing application

actions.name: GetAppValidationOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to get notification sent from application validation script.

actions.name: GetConnectors
actions.description: Grants permission to get all connectors that have been associated

actions.name: GetMessages
actions.description: Grants permission to gets messages from AWS Server Migration Service to Server Migration Connector

actions.name: GetReplicationJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get all existing jobs to migrate on-premise servers onto AWS

actions.name: GetReplicationRuns
actions.description: Grants permission to get all runs for an existing job

actions.name: GetServers
actions.description: Grants permission to get all servers that have been imported

actions.name: ImportAppCatalog
actions.description: Grants permission to import application catalog from AWS Application Discovery Service

actions.name: ImportServerCatalog
actions.description: Grants permission to gather a complete list of on-premise servers

actions.name: LaunchApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create and launch a CloudFormation stack for an existing application

actions.name: ListApps
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of summaries for existing applications

actions.name: NotifyAppValidationOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to send notification for application validation script

actions.name: PutAppLaunchConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update launch configuration for an existing application

actions.name: PutAppReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update replication configuration for an existing application

actions.name: PutAppValidationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to put validation configuration for an existing application

actions.name: SendMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to send message from Server Migration Connector to AWS Server Migration Service

actions.name: StartAppReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create and start replication jobs for an existing application

actions.name: StartOnDemandAppReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to start a replication run for an existing application

actions.name: StartOnDemandReplicationRun
actions.description: Grants permission to start a replication run for an existing replication job

actions.name: StopAppReplication
actions.description: Grants permission to stop and delete replication jobs for an existing application

actions.name: TerminateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to terminate the CloudFormation stack for an existing application

actions.name: UpdateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing application configuration

actions.name: UpdateReplicationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing job to migrate on-premise server onto AWS
